snippet: The Yankees and Mets games reached larger audiences than usual but had smaller audiences than the one the match between Serena Williams and Venus Williams drew.
abstract: United States Open quarterfinal match between Serena and Venus Williams draws larger television audience than important games being played same night by New York Yankees and New York Mets.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees and Mets games reached larger audiences than usual but had smaller audiences than the one the match between Serena Williams and Venus Williams drew.

headline.main: Pennant Races Can’t Match Williams Sisters on TV
headline.print_headline: Pennant Races Can’t Match Williams Sisters in New York
